page.title: 19Sport for Children
page.content: We do quite a lot of sport at school. Apart from swimming (see page 18) this includes seven-a-side football, netball, mini rugby, cricket, rounders, athletics and cross country running. In addition to a fifty minute games period each week practices are held after school. Netball is played on the school playground and parents, teachers and children recently made a jumping pit at the school. Cricket is played at Flimwell where they have now started a club for children of our age and older. Most other games are played at the Recreation Ground which is a ten minute walk away. As well as friendly matches against other schools tounaments are held for schools in the Crowborough and Wadhurst areas for football, netball, rounders, athletics and swimming.
